description: Searches existing Wisdom quick responses in a Wisdom knowledge base.

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: The user-defined Amazon Connect contact attributes to be resolved when search results are returned. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: searchExpression
parameters.description: The search expression for querying the quick response. filters (list) --- The configuration of filtering rules applied to quick response query results. (dict) --- The quick response fields to filter the quick response query results by. The following is the list of supported field names. name description shortcutKey isActive channels language contentType createdTime lastModifiedTime lastModifiedBy groupingConfiguration.criteria groupingConfiguration.values includeNoExistence (boolean) --- Whether to treat null value as a match for the attribute field. The name of the attribute field to filter the quick responses by. The operator to use for filtering. values (list) --- The values of attribute field to filter the quick response by. (string) --- orderOnField (dict) --- The quick response attribute fields on which the query results are ordered. The name of the attribute to order the quick response query results by. order (string) --- The order at which the quick responses are sorted by. queries (list) --- The quick response query expressions. (dict) --- The quick response fields to query quick responses by. content name description shortcutKey allowFuzziness (boolean) --- Whether the query expects only exact matches on the attribute field values. The results of the query will only include exact matches if this parameter is set to false. The name of the attribute to query the quick responses by. The operator to use for matching attribute field values in the query. priority (string) --- The importance of the attribute field when calculating query result relevancy scores. The value set for this parameter affects the ordering of search results. The values of the attribute to query the quick responses by. (string) ---

nested_params.name: filters
nested_params.description: The configuration of filtering rules applied to quick response query results.

nested_params.name: orderOnField
nested_params.description: The quick response attribute fields on which the query results are ordered.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute to order the quick response query results by.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: The order at which the quick responses are sorted by.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. Use the value returned in the previous response in the next request to retrieve the next set of results.

nested_items.name: results
nested_items.description: The results of the quick response search.

nested_items.name: attributesInterpolated
nested_items.description: The user defined contact attributes that are resolved when the search result is returned.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: attributesNotInterpolated
nested_items.description: The user defined contact attributes that are not resolved when the search result is returned.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: channels
nested_items.description: The Amazon Connect contact channels this quick response applies to. The supported contact channel types include Chat.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: contentType
nested_items.description: The media type of the quick response content.
Use application/x.quickresponse;format=plain for quick response written in plain text.
Use application/x.quickresponse;format=markdown for quick response written in richtext.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content of the quick response.

nested_items.name: plainText
nested_items.description: The container quick response content.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content of the quick response.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the quick response was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the quick response.

nested_items.name: groupingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration information of the user groups that the quick response is accessible to.

nested_items.name: criteria
nested_items.description: The criteria used for grouping Wisdom users.
RoutingProfileArn: Grouping the users by their Amazon Connect routing profile ARN. User should have SearchRoutingProfile and DescribeRoutingProfile permissions when setting criteria to this value.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The list of values that define different groups of Wisdom users.
When setting criteria to RoutingProfileArn, you need to provide a list of ARNs of Amazon Connect routing profiles as values of this parameter.

nested_items.name: isActive
nested_items.description: Whether the quick response is active.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: language
nested_items.description: The language code value for the language in which the quick response is written.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who last updated the quick response search result data.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the quick response search result data was last modified.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the quick response.

nested_items.name: quickResponseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the quick response.

nested_items.name: quickResponseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the quick response.

nested_items.name: shortcutKey
nested_items.description: The shortcut key of the quick response. The value should be unique across the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The resource status of the quick response.
(string) ---
(string) ---
